The wait is worth,several problems regarding food safety had been detected and tackled. The food produced is tested to be safe to consume. The country start mass producing food with the improved agriculture technology using SNL. The food production of Singapore had increased and the starvation problem is soon resolved. 

Conclusion: 
 The reason why we achieve this desirable outcome is because we knew the importance of thinking through the potential problems that the SNL technology could bring. Then we take appropriate prevention to these potential problems. This will allow us to make use of the new technology safely. However, we still have to pay some price sometimes. In this context, a lot of people died in the process of waiting for the safe implementation of the technology
